Kompaniya 2009 yilda tashkil etilgan, is: The company was founded in 2009, specializing in the production of 100% cotton products, investing in the latest technologies and product quality. Engaged in the production of hard and dyed cotton threads, hard, dyed, printed and woven fabrics and finished products.
Korporatsiyada mahsulotlar uchun 50 ta m: The corporation has 50 JX90A-260CM AIR JET LOOMS (China) machines installed for products, annual production capacity of Terry and waffle products enterprise: 2400 tons of Canvas, 200 tons per month. Handkerchiefs, sewing workshop for TEXPA equipment (Germany) - 1650 tons of finished products per year.
OOO \"AZAM TEKS\" Respublikadagi eng yir: AZAM TEKS LLC is one of the largest in the Republic. Manufacturer of products with a full technological cycle in Uzbekistan - cotton seed planting, harvesting, cotton cleaning plant, spinning, weaving, dyeing, sewing enterprises.
Kompaniya 2009 yilda tashkil etilgan bo': The company was founded in 2009, specializing in the production of 100% cotton products. Invests in the latest technologies and product quality. Produces hard and dyed cotton threads, printed and woven fabrics and finished products.
Korxonada 50 ta JX90A-260CM AIR JET LOOM: The enterprise has 50 JX90A-260CM AIR JET LOOMS (China) looms installed. Annual production capacity of Terry and waffle products enterprise: 2400 tons of Canvas, 200 tons of handkerchiefs per month, sewing enterprise (Germany) - 1650 tons of finished products per year.
